coreAttributes.name: underbust corset
coreAttributes.description: A corset designed to be worn over a shirt and cinch the waist of the wearer, while leaving their breasts totally exposed. It has a series of laces at the front that are used to tighten it.

replacementText.self: [npc.Name] [npc.verb(place)] the underbust corset around [npc.her] stomach before tying the laces up.
replacementText.other: [npc.Name] [npc.verb(place)] the underbust corset around [npc2.her] stomach before tying the laces up.
replacementText.otherRough: [npc.Name] roughly [npc.verb(force)] the underbust corset around [npc2.her] stomach before roughly tightening the laces up.

displacementText.self: [npc.Name] [npc.verb(untie)] [npc.her] corset's laces and [npc.verb(remove)] it from [npc.her] stomach.
displacementText.other: [npc.Name] [npc.verb(untie)] [npc2.namePos] corset's laces and [npc.verb(remove)] it from [npc2.her] stomach.
displacementText.otherRough: [npc.Name] roughly [npc.verb(undo)] [npc2.namePos] corset's laces and [npc.verb(remove)] it from [npc2.her] stomach.
